CustomField.description: -Create a cohesive & high performance team that continuously strives for positive results & improvements -Coach team by providing specific feedback & hold them accountable for performance -Create learning & development opportunities for team -Create & effectively executes development plans based on their individual strengths, development needs, and career aspirations -Ensures all managers are doing the same for their direct reports -Identifies resource needed to strengthen team -Creates succession plans for future job openings
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Create a cohesive & high performance team that continuously strives for positive results & improvements -Coach team by providing feedback & hold them accountable for performance -Create learning & development opportunities for team -Create & effectively executes development plans based on their individual strengths, development needs, and career aspirations -Ensures all managers are doing the same for their direct reports -Identifies resource needed to strengthen team -Creates succession plan
CustomField.label: Talent Mgmt & Organizational Capability
